attributes.action: The people of The United Kingdom demands a explanation from The Government
attributes.additional_details:
We The people of The United Kingdom demand a answer from The Right Honourable Theresa May MP  Prime Minister 10 Downing Street London  SW1A 2AA representing the people on the Brexit deal , Why The Government have you not pushed forward The Democratic vote of The People, and why have you taken it upon yourself to propose a deal with Eu.
The delaying tactic reference Irelands Backstop, has nothing to do with The peoples Vote of leaving the Eu, Northern Ireland is part of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom European Union membership referendum, also known as the EU referendum and the Brexit referendum, took place on 23 June 2016 in the United Kingdom (UK) and Gibraltar to ask the people if they wanted the country either to remain a member of or to leave the European Union

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
